content: 148, 149, 150-aam masumoor
148-aam masumoor
/turangiyavare! Ningal unarnnezhunnettu sthuthippin / aakaashatthil ninnu kartthaavine sthuthippin / unnathangalil avane sthuthippin.
/tavante sakala doothanmaare! Avane sthuthippin / avante sakala synyangalume! Avane sthuthippin.

/taadithyachandranmaare! Avane sthuthippin / prakaashamulla sakala nakshathrangalume! Avane sthuthippin / aakaashangalute aakaashavum aakaashangalkku meetheyulla vellangalume! Avane sthuthippin / ava kartthaavine sthuthikkatte.
/tenthennaal avan paranju / ava undaayi. Avan kalppicchu / ava srushtikkappettu. Avan avaye ennekkumaayi sthirappetutthi / avan oru niyamam nishchayicchu. Athu azhi yunnathumalla.

/tbhoomiyilninnu mahaasarppangalum / ellaa aazhangalum / agni yum, kalmazhayum / himavum, uraccha vellavum / avan്re vachanaprakaaram pravartthikkunna kaattukalum kotunkaattukalume / kartthaavine sthuthippin.
/tparvvathangalum sakala kunnukalum / phalavrukshangalum sakala kaarakilukalum / mrugangalum sakala kannukaalikalum / izhajanthukkalum pakshikalum paravakalume kartthaavine sthuthippin.

/tbhoomiyile raajaakkanmaarum / sakala janangalum bhoomiyile prabhukkanmaarum sakala nyaayaadhipanmaarum / shishukkalum kanyakamaarum vruddhanmaarum yuvaakkalum / kartthaavinte naamatthe sthuthikkatte.

/tenthennaal avante naamam maathram valiyathaakunnu / avante mahathvam bhoomiyilum aakaashatthilum undu / avan thante janatthinte kompum / than്re sakala neethimaanmaarkkum! Thinte svantham janamaaya israayel makkalkkum mahathvavum uyartthunnu.
149-aam masumoor

/tkartthaavinu oru puthiya paattum / neethimaanmaarute sabhayil avante sthuthiyum paatuvin / israyel thante srashtaavil santhoshikkukayum / sehiyon്re puthranmaar thangalute raajaavil aanandikkukayum cheyyatte.

/tavar thappukalaalum chathuratthappukalaalum avan്re naamatthe sthuthikkukayum / veenakalaal avanu paatukayum cheyyatte / enthennaal kartthaavu than്re janatthil ishtappetunnu / avan daridrarkku raksha kotukkukayum cheyyunnu.
/tneethimaanmaar bahumaanatthil balappetum / avar thangalute kattilukalilmel avane sthuthikkukayum / thangalute kandtangalkondu dyvatthe pukazhtthukayum cheyyum.

/tpurajaathikalkku prathikriyayum / janangalkku shaasanayum kotuppaanum / avarute raajaakkanmaare aalaatthukalkondum / avarute maanyanmaare irumpuchangalakalkondu bandhippaanum / ezhuthappettirikkunna nyaayavidhi avarutemel natatthuvaanum / avante sakala neethimaanmaarkkum mahathvam undaakuvaanum / avarute kykalil irumunavaal undu.
150-aam masumoor
/tkartthaavine avan്re shuddhasthalatthu sthuthippin / avante shakthiyute aakaashatthattil avane sthuthippin.
/tavan്re vallabhathvatthil avane sthuthippin / avante shreshdtathayute bahuthvatthil avane sthuthippin / kompinte shabdatthaal avane sthuthippin / thamburukalaalum veenakalaalum avane sthuthippin.

/tthappukalaalum chathuratthappukalaalum avane sthuthippin / maadhuryamulla kampikalaal avane sthuthippin / naadamulla kytthaalangalaal avane sthuthippin / shabdatthaalum aarppuviliyaalum avane sthuthippin / ellaashvaasavum kartthaavine sthuthikkatte.

/tsakala jaathikalume! Kartthaavine sthuthippin / sakala janangalume! Avane sthuthippin / enthennaal avante krupa nammutemel balappettirikkunnu / avan sathyamaayittu ennekkum kartthaavaakunnu / dyvame! Sthuthi ninakku yogyamaakunnu.
